title: Make a Sling Club
brief: Create a sling club with a weight hanging 8-10cm from the handle for extended reach and multiplied force.
steps: Step 1: Find a suitable handle and a weight (stone or other heavy object).
Step 2: Create strong, flexible lashing material from available cordage or plant fibers.
Step 3: Attach the weight so it hangs 8 to 10 centimeters from the handle end.
Step 4: Ensure the lashing is strong enough to withstand the force of swinging.
Step 5: Practice the swinging motion to get comfortable with the extended reach.
warnings: The flexible weight can strike you if not handled properly - practice carefully.
Ensure lashing is extremely strong as the weight will experience high forces.
Be aware of the extended reach - you need more space to use this effectively.
